## TransactableLiquity.sendZERO() method

Send ZERO tokens to an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendZERO(toAddress: string, amount: Decimalish): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                   | Description             |
| --------- | -------------------------------------- | ----------------------- |
| toAddress | string                                 | Address of receipient.  |
| amount    | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of ZERO to send. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./lib-base.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.
